content:
Performance

  • Volume of Messages

    • Depends on application
    • TCP/IP locally > 1000 / second
    • Some apps require more bandwidth
    • Normal communication much less

  • Size of Messages

    • Large messages are problematic
    • Message size not predictable
    • Pass file handle
      • Server/client option
      • Removing the file is a problem
